title: Bug in Navigation Challenge World Generation

content.raw:
**Overview**

When running the navigation challenge with a yaml-generated world file, it does not have `/vrx/task/info` topic published. I also do not think that there is a scoring plugin in the generated world.

**Steps to recreate**

1. Source vrx-ws and move to vrx\_gazebo `roscd vrx_gazebo`
2. Run `mkdir -p ~/worlds ~/world_xacros`
3. Run ``roslaunch vrx_gazebo generate_worlds.launch requested:=`pwd`/worlds/yamls/nav_challenge_shallow.yaml world_xacro_target:="$HOME/world_xacros/" world_target:="$HOME/worlds/"``
4. Run `roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch world:="$HOME/worlds/nav_challenge_shallow0.world"`
5. In another terminal run `rostopic list` `/vrx/task/info` will not be there
6. Investigate in the yaml and generated world

Fix files nav\_challenge\_shallow.yaml and nav\_challenge\_deep.yaml
content.html:
Overview

When running the navigation challenge with a yaml-generated world file, it does not have /vrx/task/info topic published. I also do not think that there is a scoring plugin in the generated world.

Steps to recreate

  1. Source vrx-ws and move to vrx_gazebo roscd vrx_gazebo
  2. Run mkdir -p ~/worlds ~/world_xacros
  3. Run roslaunch vrx_gazebo generate_worlds.launch requested:=`pwd`/worlds/yamls/nav_challenge_shallow.yaml world_xacro_target:="$HOME/world_xacros/" world_target:="$HOME/worlds/"
  4. Run roslaunch vrx_gazebo sandisland.launch world:="$HOME/worlds/nav_challenge_shallow0.world"
  5. In another terminal run rostopic list /vrx/task/info will not be there
  6. Investigate in the yaml and generated world

Fix files nav_challenge_shallow.yaml and nav_challenge_deep.yaml
